items.title: Yom Yerushalyim the First Mincha at the Kotel 1967
items.description:
rabbiplewin posted a photo:

After 19 years Rabbi Shlomo Goren the chief Rabbi of The IDF led the first mincha at the Kotel. From 1948-1967 no Jew was allowed to pray at the Kotel. Rabbi Goren , in his autobiography With Might and Strength, describes the scenes of entering the old city and leading the first service at the Kotel. I have seen the footage but reading his memoirs of the day was amazing. I share the scenes he described with you. Happy Yom Yerushalayim #yomyerushalayim #jerusalemday #yomyerushalayim2021 Did you like the video? Show your support by dropping a like, sharing the video and leaving a comment and don't forget to subscribe and hit the bell notification button. bit.ly/3pCdOB1​ Get Rabbi Goren's book With Might and Strength here amzn.to/3bfI3sD ▼Follow me on social media▼ Join the Facebook Group bit.ly/2kF23hw​​​ Instagram www.instagram.com/rabzlewin​​​ TikTok @Rabbilewin website: www.rabbilewin.net You are watching Yom Yerushalyim the First Mincha at the Kotel 1967 at youtu.be/4z0HOlxEWdo You may also be interested in: ▼Weekly Torah Portion▼ Parshat Emor 2021: It’s Not Fair! Engaging the Inner Child. youtu.be/KLNYJkjMmpM Parshat Acharei Mot Kedoshim Loving Your Neighbour as Yourself youtu.be/CTvfc-k-n5w​ Parshat Tazria Metzora 2021 It Looks Like a Problem youtu.be/ecTvIM-I1Fk​ ▼Jewish Festivals▼ Shavuot, What Is Shavuot? youtu.be/5GS9L6iCQKM Passover Seder Plate! What Goes on the Seder Plate? youtu.be/dNCtE21HyFI​​ Why 4 Cups of Wine on Passover? youtu.be/CZuVb-dUKo8​​ The Meaning of the 4 Shabbatot Before Passover youtu.be/RQEsOx_61jc​​ Running The Passover Seder a Quick Guide| A Guide For Seder Night youtu.be/vFKsxhaUCqE​​​ ▼Jewish Songs▼ Highlights of the Passover Seder. youtu.be/PmqymrGmPEg​​ Adon Olam Bringing The Seder Service To Your Home youtu.be/UR8PXi_JUOk​​​ The Seder Songs Hallel youtu.be/u9z0I7jhSjU​​​ ▼Corona▼ Kaddish In Times Of Corona What To Do youtu.be/Dut1HTD33PQ​​​ Shul Is Closed What To Do? youtu.be/-zHaEmworcE​​​ ▼10 Facts Series▼ 10 Facts about Rosh Hashanah youtu.be/PJMgkpV7YS8​​​ 10 Facts about Pesach youtu.be/YlMlBE080nY​​​ 10 Foods We Eat At The Seder youtu.be/IA-Ms5P_aYo​​​ Inspired by these videos: Sulam Ya'aqov Inc. youtu.be/27B80EoLI3k​ Lapid Judaism -https://youtu.be/PkyyVcCQv1s Disclaimer: As an Amazon Associate I earn from qualifying purchases.
